thread.title: Best place to stay - Review
thread.title_full: Best place to stay - Review of Cambria Hotel & Suites - New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Apfelbaumtravels
title: Best place to stay - Review
text:
When on holiday I try always to be flexible and find easy ways for commuting through the city. The Cambria is located very close to Times Square. The staff is super-friendly - I have stayed earlier in NY, but such a personal approach I never experienced before. All is very clean (at least for US). I was very positively surprised - plus the price was really reasonable.
I really can recommend this hotel. Even if my room was with no view at all (ok, I had a window, but it was no good view - no sky, no sun) - and also the furniture was quite dark. Still,I could make my own coffee in the morning. The bathroom was very clean. When I will be travelling to New York the next time - it will be for sure to this place.
